attributes.action: Halt the erosion of the English cultural identity.
attributes.additional_details: Please do not infer that this petition implies a hatred of migrants. England has always been a diverse country and I am proud of how tolerant and worldly we are. However, England is and always should be a country predominantly for the English, complete with our unique culture, traditions and values. At current rates of migration it will not be long before being 'English' is a thing of the past. So, in order to protect our English cultural identity please promote it and lower immigration. Thanks.
attributes.background: 1 in 5 primary school children do not speak English as a first language. Foreign-born residents here have doubled in 10 years. UK population will reach 70 million by 2027 and 51% of this rise will be due to migrants. These migration rates threaten to drastically erode English cultural identity.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take around English cultural identity.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like to see happen.
